summary: TAKATA RECALL.  FIRST IS DUE WE HAD WAS THIS TIME LAST YEAR WHERE A BLOWN HEAD GASKET CAUSED US TO HAVE TO REPLACE THE ENTIRE ENGINE AT 52,000. TODAY WE GO TO LEAVE AN THE CAR SAYS IT'S IN N WHEN IT'S ACTUALLY IN PARK. WILL NOT ALLOW US TO MOVE SHIFTER BUT THE KEY IS ABLE TO BE REMOVED AS WELL AS YOU CAN EASILY PUSH THE CAR AND MOVE IT LIKE IT WAS IN N AGAIN WITH NO KEY IN IGNITION. PLEASE HELP DIRECT US IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION
